author: nero_eth
content:
What is the latest around handling builders around the fork transition?
In the specs it seems a builder's deposit must be finalized although in builder.md it says *processed* here: ⁨`Builders are active as soon as the deposit is processed on the consensus layer.`⁩

author: jih2nn
content: If you're referring to a transition from Fulu to Gloas, this [PR](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4868) would give you an answer
